charges.charge_description: 21:841 Possession of methamphetamine with the intent to distribute; 18:2 Aiding and abetting (INDICTMENT 1/31/2017)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Amended Judgment filed 1/8/2018: No change to the sentence (clerical mistake); Original Judgment filed 12/19/2017: Sentenced to 120 months imprisonment (Term of imprisonment to run concurrently with 31st District Court, Wheeler County, Texas, cases 4831 and 4832, which the defendant is currently serving); 5 years supervised release; $100 special assessment fee; fine is waived; restitution is not applicable.
